00019    /*
00020    * Constructor.
00021    */
00022    MemoryIArchive::MemoryIArchive()
00023     : buffer_(0),
00024       begin_(0),
00025       cursor_(0),
00026       end_(0),
00027       endAllocated_(0),
00028       oArchivePtr_(0),
00029       capacity_(0),
00030       version_(0),
00031       ownsData_(false)
00032    {}
00033 
00034    /*
00035    * Destructor.
00036    */
00037    MemoryIArchive::~MemoryIArchive()
00038    {  if (buffer_ && ownsData_) delete buffer_; }
00039 
00040    /*
00041    * Allocate a block of memory.
00042    */
00043    void MemoryIArchive::allocate(size_t capacity)
00044    {
00045       if (begin_) {
00046          UTIL_THROW("Re-allocation is prohibited");
00047       }
00048       buffer_ = new Byte[capacity + sizeof(size_t)];
00049       begin_  = buffer_ + sizeof(size_t);
00050       cursor_ = begin_;
00051       end_ = begin_;
00052       endAllocated_ = begin_ + capacity; 
00053       capacity_ = capacity;
00054       ownsData_ = true; 
00055    }
00056 
00060    MemoryIArchive& MemoryIArchive::operator = (MemoryOArchive& other)
00061    {
00062       if (isAllocated()) {
00063          UTIL_THROW("This MemoryIArchive is already allocated");
00064       }
00065       buffer_ = other.buffer_;
00066       begin_ = other.begin_;
00067       cursor_ = other.begin_;
00068       end_ = other.cursor_;
00069       endAllocated_ = other.endAllocated_;
00070       capacity_ = other.capacity_;
00071       ownsData_ = false;
00072       oArchivePtr_ = &other;
00073       other.isLocked_ = true;
00074       return *this;
00075    }
00076 
00077    /*
00078    * Reset cursor to beginning, prepare to reread.
00079    */
00080    void MemoryIArchive::reset()
00081    {
00082       if (!isAllocated()) {
00083          UTIL_THROW("Archive is not allocated");
00084       }  
00085       cursor_ = begin(); 
00086    }
00087 
00088    /*
00089    * Clear memory block (reset to empty state).
00090    */
00091    void MemoryIArchive::clear()
00092    {
00093       if (!isAllocated()) {
00094          UTIL_THROW("Archive is not allocated");
00095       }
00096       if (!ownsData_) {  
00097          UTIL_THROW("Archive does not own data");
00098       }
00099       cursor_ = begin(); 
00100       end_ = begin();
00101    }
00102 
00103    /*
00104    * Release associated data acquired by assignment.
00105    */
00106    void MemoryIArchive::release()
00107    {
00108       if (!begin_) {
00109          UTIL_THROW("This archive has no associated data");
00110       }
00111       if (ownsData_) {
00112          UTIL_THROW("This archive owns its data");
00113       }
00114       buffer_ = 0;
00115       begin_ = 0;
00116       cursor_ = 0;
00117       end_ = 0;
00118       endAllocated_ = 0;
00119       capacity_ = 0;
00120       ownsData_ = false;
00121       oArchivePtr_->isLocked_ = false;
00122       oArchivePtr_ = 0;
00123    }
00124 
00125    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00126    /*
00127    * Receive a block.
00128    */
00129    void MemoryIArchive::recv(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int source)
00130    {
00131       int  myRank     = comm.Get_rank();
00132       int  comm_size  = comm.Get_size();
00133 
00134       // Preconditions
00135       if (source > comm_size - 1 || source < 0) {
00136          UTIL_THROW("Source rank out of bounds");
00137       }
00138       if (source == myRank) {
00139          UTIL_THROW("Source and desination identical");
00140       }
00141 
00142       size_t recvCapacity = capacity_ + sizeof(size_t);
00143       comm.Recv(buffer_, recvCapacity, MPI::UNSIGNED_CHAR, source, 5);
00144 
00145       begin_ = buffer_ + sizeof(size_t);
00146       cursor_ = begin_;
00147 
00148       size_t* sizePtr = (size_t*) buffer_;
00149       size_t  size = *sizePtr;
00150       end_  = buffer_ + size;
00151    }
00152    #endif
00153 
00154    /*
00155    * Load a std::string from MemoryIArchive.
00156    */
00157    template <>
00158    void serialize(MemoryIArchive& ar, std::string& data, 
00159                   const unsigned int version)
00160    {
00161       static std::vector<char> charvec;
00162       size_t size;
00163       ar.unpack(size);
00164       if (size > charvec.capacity()) {
00165          charvec.reserve(size + 8);
00166       }
00167       ar.unpack(&charvec[0], size);
00168       data = &charvec[0];
00169    }
00170 
00171 }
00172 #endif
